nodes.text: The brother of the Imperial cadet Giles was a male individual. In 5 BBY, he heard a rumor from his friend about a cadet at the Pretor Flats Academy on the planet Lothal who confessed to treason and was consequently taken into custody by stormtroopers. He later passed this story on to his brother Giles, who in turn recounted the story to their fellow cadets at the Academy for Young Imperials.
